extendedInfo.description: Android Flight Simulator! - Now FREE!!Realistic clouds are now here! Experience what it's like to fly a jet high up in the clouds!This is a complete reworked flight simulator with better graphics and a huge improvement in realistic flight simulation. Take control of 10 aircraft and fly on a huge photo-realistic terrain. The flight simulator has no levels or missions it is purely for flight simulation, you can practice landing and taking off or simply fly different aircraft and enjoy the scenery.Flight Simulator changes:--- Flight simulation is based on physics and is no longer math based as with previous flight simulators.--- Flight controls are now split into Roll, Pitch and Yaw adding more realism.--- Terrain is now 3 times larger than in any previous flight simulator.--- Ability to stall an aircraft.--- Photo-realistic terrain makes it feel like you're actually flying above the ground.--- 2 flight simulator instruments added (heading and vertical angle).Android flight simulator makes it possible for you to experience the true flight simulation on you mobile device!

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: I know one of these requests are a bit strange but there should be a way to put the gear up, have different views rather than just outside, a world map and maybe a control tower villages, towns, city\'s, not just google earth, and other planes flying round. And I do not like the controls. Make them tilt controls. Apart from everything else I said, it\'s good. Please update with at least one of the things a mentioned.
